name: COMMUNITY AWARENESS AND DEVELOPMENT FOUNDATION

address: 194, Beo-O Center opp. West Police Station.

briefDescription: Community Awareness & Development(CAD)Foundation is an organisation formed by like minded ex-drug users, who have experienced the pain and agony of drug use. It was established in 20th Dec 2004 and is registered under Registration of Societies Act 1860. CAD Foundation is also a platform to address and raise the issues of drug user and related diseases like HIV/STI/Hep-B/C and, to create awareness  among the general public, to reduce stigma & discrimination, and to improve the social living standards of drug users by extending care and support.VISION: A just society with people of different behaviors, ethnicity and gender co-exist in harmony, equality and non-discrimination.
